author: Soumyadip Das
title: Sandakphu Phalut in December 2015
text: # 1 Hello All, We are planning for our first trek at Sandakphu & Phalut, this December/January i.e. from 25th Dec to 2nd Jan. Our itenary is as follows: 25/12/2015 - NJP to Chitrey (by car) 26/12/2015 - Chitrey to Tonglu (by trek) 27/12/2015 - Tonglu to Kalipokhri (by trek) 28/12/2015 - Kalipokhri to Sandakphu (by trek) 29/12/2015 - Sandakphu to Phalut (by trek) 30/12/2015 - Phalut to Gorkhey (by trek) 31/12/2015 - Gorkhey to Ribdi (by trek), then to Okhrey (by car) 01/01/2016 - Stay at Okhrey 02/01/2016 - Okhrey to NJP (by car) 01/01/2016 is a buffer day, if required then we can use it during the trek, otherwise will stay at Okhrey. We intentionally skipped Dhortey route, because we have enough time. I want to know about the plan from 30/12 to 02/01 1. Is this section of the plan OK? 2. Trek to Ribdi is possible? 3. What is the route condition? 4. Is it possible from Phalut to Ribdi in one day? If so then we can change our plan. Thanks in advance.
